'''Friends at the Doorstep''' is part of the [[Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze]] event in [[Version 4.4]].

==Requirements==
The player may invite 1 character into their party once [[Festive Fever (Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze)|Festive Fever]] reaches 800.

==Available Characters==
